content: An American entrepreneur, born in the 1980s, known for co-founding a social media platform. His name is "Mark" what?

Mark Zuckerberg. He co-founded Facebook, which is now known as Meta Platforms, Inc. He was born on May 14, 1984, in White Plains, New York. He is an American technology entrepreneur and philanthropist. He is known for co-founding Facebook while he was a student at Harvard University in 2004. The platform quickly gained popularity and became one of the most widely used social media platforms in the world. Under Zuckerberg's leadership, Facebook acquired other popular platforms such as Instagram and WhatsApp. In 2017, he announced that he was changing the name of the company to Meta Platforms, Inc., to reflect its focus on building the metaverse. He is also involved in philanthropic activities through the Chan Zuckerberg Initiative, which he co-founded with his wife, Priscilla Chan.
